EmailTemplate.subject: Your BigCommerce Catalog Transfer: Congrats, it’s time to set up your store
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.Contact_First_Name__c},
It’s official: we’ve completed the catalog transfer from your store to BigCommerce. Welcome to the family!
The catalog transfer is the first step in successfully re-launching your online business with BigCommerce. Now it’s time to get your business ready to sell! Here are a few things to finalize before you launch:
- Organize your categories - Add homepage text - Add category descriptions/images (if needed) - Set up store settings - Set up shipping, taxes and payment gateways - Place a test order - Move over your domain - Install an SSL certificate (optional)
If this feels overwhelming, don't fret. We have a team of Support Ninjas who can help guide you in setting up your store. To utilize this free service simply call 866-949-5336.
It has been great working with you. Good luck and happy selling!
Thanks,
The BigCommerce Team
Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
